si.t: Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops Privilege Escalation Vulnerability (CTX319750)

Synopsis: An application installed on the remote Windows host is affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability._x000D__x000D_Description: The version of Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops installed on the remote Windows host is 2016 and earlier, or s 1912 LTSR CU3 or earlier. It is, therefore, affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability. An unspecified flaw exists related to Citrix Profile Management or Citrix Profile Management WMI Plugin that allows a local attacker to escalate privileges to SYSTEM.
Note that Nessus has not tested for this issue but has instead relied only on the application's self-reported version number._x000D__x000D_Solution: Refer to vendor advisory._x000D__x000D_See Also: https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX319750_x000D__x000D_CVSS Base Score: 7.8_x000D__x000D_CVSS Vector: CVSS2#AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C_x000D__x000D_Plugin Output: Path : C:\Program Files\Citrix\XenDesktopVdaSetup\XenDesktopVdaSetup.exe Installed version : Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops 7 1912 LTSR CU1 Fixed version : See Solution. _x000D__x000D_CPE: cpe:/a:citrix:virtual_apps_and_desktops_x000D__x000D_CVE: NULL _x000D__x000D_BID: NULL_x000D__x000D_Crossref: NULL_x000D__x000D_Vulnerability Publication Date: 2021-07-12_x000D__x000D_Patch Publication Date: 2021-07-12_x000D__x000D_Plugin Modification Date: 2021-08-17_x000D__x000D_Exploitability Ease: No known exploits are available_x000D__x000D_Plugin Type: local_x000D__x000D_Source File: _x000D__x000D_

Synopsis: An application installed on the remote Windows host is affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability.
Description: The version of Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops installed on the remote Windows host is 2016 and earlier, or s 1912 LTSR CU3 or earlier. It is, therefore, affected by a privilege escalation vulnerability. An unspecified flaw exists related to Citrix Profile Management or Citrix Profile Management WMI Plugin that allows a local attacker to escalate privileges to SYSTEM.
Note that Nessus has not tested for this issue but has instead relied only on the application's self-reported version number.
Solution: Refer to vendor advisory.
See Also: https://support.citrix.com/article/CTX319750
CVSS Base Score: 7.8
CVSS Vector: CVSS2#AV:L/AC:L/Au:N/C:C/I:C/A:C
Plugin Output: Path : C:\Program Files\Citrix\XenDesktopVdaSetup\XenDesktopVdaSetup.exe Installed version : Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops 7 1912 LTSR CU1 Fixed version : See Solution.
CPE: cpe:/a:citrix:virtual_apps_and_desktops
CVE: NULL

Patch Publication Date: 2021-07-12
